entries.title: Blizzard games go dark in China, with no return in sight: 'This is so tragic,' says former Hearthstone director
entries.description: Blizzard is still looking for a "new partner" to bring its games back to Chinese players, but for now, they're out of luck.

entries.title: I can't believe this Elden Ring Halo map isn't actually imported from Elden Ring
entries.description: This remake of Crumbling Farum Azula shows how versatile the new Halo Forge editor is.

entries.title: In a mad display of devotion, these gamers are fighting Souls series bosses over and over again until Elden Ring DLC is announced
entries.description: Punking Malenia and Slave Knight Gael however many times it takes.

entries.title: Steam sale on base-building games includes new releases and old favorites
entries.description: There are some great deals on base builders, colony builders, and city builders on Steam this week, running until January 30.

entries.title: Forspoken reviews roundup: 'remarkably generic'
entries.description: Turns out Forspoken's story is indeed mostly cringe, but there's some fun to find in its combat and movement.

entries.title: Three years after its original release, the latest Trackmania is finally coming to Steam
entries.description: It was supposed to launch on Stadia early this year, but that didn't work out.

entries.title: The next SteamWorld game is a city builder, and there's a free demo out now
entries.description: SteamWorld Build is coming later in 2023, but you can try it out for free today.

entries.title: Some Intel Raptor Lake motherboards keep dropping wired connections thanks to a design flaw
entries.description: As of now, there's no fix.

entries.title: Modern Warfare 2's hardcore mode finally returns next month, but fans are upset it took this long
entries.description: The mode has been a CoD staple for ages, and fans were baffled when it didn't ship with MW2.

entries.title: This rhythm game just became one of Steam's worst games of all time
entries.description: O2Jam Online hasn't been the launch longtime fans were hoping for.

entries.title: Exclusive: Bungie answers our burning questions about build crafting in Destiny 2: Lightfall
entries.description: Resilience is getting tweaked, how to replicate the Font of Might buff, and more in our Q&A with the devs.

entries.title: Dragon Age 4 just lost its veteran production director
entries.description: With 19 years at BioWare, Mac Walters was also a key figure behind the Mass Effect series.

entries.title: World of Warcraft Classic gets a modern facelift thanks to files ripped out of the latest Portal game
entries.description: The video highlights the potential of Nvidia's still-unreleased RTX Remix software to bring fresh visuals to aging games.

entries.title: Mahokenshi review
entries.description: A light deckbuilder in strategy-RPG clothes.

entries.title: Merriam-Webster now has its own, appropriately impossible Wordle clone
entries.description: It joins the company's already substantial collection of word games and quizzes.

entries.title: Three episodes in, the Nier: Automata anime has been blindsided by delays
entries.description: Episode 4 was meant to air at the end of this month, but Covid had other ideas.

entries.title: Wordle hint and answer today: Let's solve #583, January 23
entries.description: Today's Wordle: Help to solve Monday's puzzle.

entries.title: The Dead Space remake is too scary for its own technical director
entries.description: Not one to play with headphones at night, apparently.

entries.title: Tape storage was up in 2022 while HDD sales fell
entries.description: Admittedly, not in any gaming rigs we've seen.

entries.title: Ready your cyberbike and tear out a robot's guts with a grappling hook in Gripper
entries.description: Gripper is a wicked action game that puts you on a cyberpunk cycle, ala Akira.

entries.title: Lost Ark's Witcher crossover is a disappointment
entries.description: Though taking selfies with Geralt never gets old.

entries.title: Five new Steam games you probably missed (January 23, 2023)
entries.description: Sorting through every new game on Steam so you don't have to.
